item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="custom" us_bg_color="#91c3c6" us_text_color="#ffffff" us_bg_image="3874" us_bg_size="initial" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_pos="bottom right" us_bg_parallax="vertical"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

ALEXANDR SMITH

Web Design, UI/UX, Branding[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

LITTLE STORY ABOUT MY PROFESSIONAL CAREER

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain. These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator type="invisible" size="huge"][vc_column_text]

MY SKILLS

[/vc_column_text][us_progbar title="Photoshop" count="99" style="5" color="secondary" size="4px"][us_progbar title="Illustrator" count="80" style="5" color="text" size="4px"][us_progbar title="InDesign" count="67" style="5" color="text" size="4px"][us_progbar title="Sketch" count="55" style="5" color="text" size="4px"][us_separator type="invisible" size="huge"][vc_column_text]

MY CLIENTS

[/vc_column_text][us_logos columns="5" with_indents="1" items="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%223235%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%223228%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%223217%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%223214%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%223212%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%222051%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%222049%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%222047%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%222044%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%222042%22%7D%5D" carousel_autoplay="1" carousel_interval="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="secondary" us_bg_image="3874"][vc_column][us_cta title="Have a new interesting project?" color="secondary" btn_link="url:%2Fcontact%2F||" btn_label="Contact me" btn_size="18px"][/us_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]
